name: Krakit
overview: Find the Name of the Country, City & Number in 12 Clues Like This One Below: *Where it all began, Where the torch was first lit. *Where the muscle and sinews strain. *Where our hero's win acclaim. *Where the symbols hold the key. Solving the cryptic clues put the player in the running to win a £10,000 prize in this competition / publicity stunt.
